title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\CreatePatchDeploymentRequest
name: CreatePatchDeploymentRequest
description:
A request message for creating a patch deployment.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.CreatePatchDeploymentRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The project to apply this patch deployment to in the form projects/*.

params.name: data.patch_deployment_id
params.description: Required. A name for the patch deployment in the project. When creating a name the following rules apply: Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. Must start with a letter. Must be between 1-63 characters. Must end with a number or a letter. * Must be unique within the project.

methods.name: getPatchDeploymentId
methods.description:
Required. A name for the patch deployment in the project. When creating a name the following rules apply:

  • Must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

  • Must start with a letter.

  • Must be between 1-63 characters.

  • Must end with a number or a letter.

  • Must be unique within the project.
